channel.description: Recent content in Posts on nrd blog

item.title: Death Note ~ デスノート
item.description: Author: Nathan Dodson | Date: 04-17-2020 | Contains Spoilers Introduction I’m not really sure where to start here - Death Notewas a wild ride, and I am still working through my feelings about how it ended. I always develop some kind of expectation for how a show might end, and occasionally I let myself get carried away with that hyopthetical and get disappointed with how it actually ends. I can say with certainty though that Death Note ended in the only way possible - with the death of Light.

item.title: Your Lie in April ~ 四月は君の嘘
item.description: Author: Nathan Dodson | Date: 04-07-2020 | Contains Spoilers Introduction When I was first recomended this series, I could never have expected the level of heartache that it would incite. From the music to the character development over time, to simply the circumstance that Arima Kousei and his beloved friends are forced to endure - all of these things add up to what is a very pure account of the inner workings of a 15 year old’s mind.
